S04n436:1: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo nihatamārapratyarthiko marditakaṇṭako raṇaśirasi vijitavijayaḥ uchritachatradhvajapatāko viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdhamaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma |
S04n436:2: savitarkasavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma |
S04n436:3: sa prītervirāgādupekṣako viharati sma smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhaṃ kāyena pratisaṃvedayate sma yattadāryā ācakṣate sma-upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī,
S04n436:5: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma ||
S04n436:6: atha bodhisattvasyathā samāhite citte pariśuddhe paryavadāte prabhāsvare'naṅgane vigatopakleśe mṛduni karmaṇyupasthite ānijjyaprāpte rātryāṃ prathame yāme divyasya cakṣuṣo jñānadarśanavidyāsākṣātkriyāyai cittamabhinirharati sma,
S04n436:8: atha bodhisattvo divyena cakṣuṣā pariśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati sma cyavamānānupapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān sugatān durgatān hīnān praṇītān |
S04n436:9: yathākarmopagān sattvān prajānāti sma-ime bata bhoḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ,
S04n436:12: te mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇādapāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante |
S04n436:17: iti hi divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvānāpaśyati sma cyavamānānupapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān sugatān durgatān hīnān praṇītān yathākarmopagān |
S04n436:18: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rātryāṃ prathame yāme vidyāṃ sākṣātkaroti sma,
S04n436:21: atha bodhisattvastathā samāhite citte pariśuddhe paryavadāte prabhāsvare niraṅgane vigatopakleśe mṛduni karmaṇyupasthite āniñjyaprāpte rātryāṃ madhyame yāme pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānadarśanavidyāsākṣātkriyāyai cittamabhinirharati sma,
S04n436:24: tadyathā-ekāmapi jātiṃ dve tisraścatasraḥ pañca daśa viṃśati triṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśajjātiśataṃ jātisahasraṃ jātiśatasahasram anekānyapi jātiśatasahasrāṇyapi jātikoṭīmapi jātikoṭīśatamapi jātikoṭīsahasramapi jātikoṭīnayutamapi |
S04n436:25: anekānyapi jātikoṭīsahasrāṇyapi anekānyapi jātikoṭīśatasahasrāṇyapi anekānyapi jātikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yāvatsaṃvartakalpamapi vivartakalpamapi saṃvartavivartakalpamapi anekānyapi saṃvartavivartakalpānyanusmarati sma-amutrāhamāsannevaṃnāmā evaṃgotra evaṃjātya evaṃvarṇa evamāhāra evamāyuṣpramāṇamevaṃ cirasthitikaḥ,
S04n436:28: tataścyutvehopapanna iti sākāraṃ soddeśamanekavidhamātmanaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ ca pūrvanivāsamanusmarati sma ||
S04n436:29: atha bodhisattvastathā samāhitena cittena pariśuddhena paryavadātena prabhāsvareṇa anaṅganena vigatopakleśena mṛdunā karmaṇye sthitenāniñcyaprāptena rātryāṃ paścime yāme aruṇoddhāṭanakālasamaye nandīmukhyāṃ rātrau duḥkhasamudayāstaṃgatāyā āśravakṣayajñānadarśanavidyāsākṣātkriyāyai cittamabhinirharati sma,
S04n436:31: tasyaitadabhavat-kṛcchraṃ batāyaṃ loka āpanno yaduta jāyate jīryate mriyate cyavate upapadyate |
S04n436:32: atha ca punarasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya niḥsaraṇaṃ na saṃprajānāti jarāvyādhimaraṇādikasya |
S04n436:33: aho batāsya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasyāntaḥkriyā na prajñāyate sarvasya jarāvyādhimaraṇādikasya ||
S04n436:40: tasyaitadabhavat-bhave sati jātirbhavati bhavapratyayā ca punarjātiḥ ||
S04n436:49: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat-kasmin sati tṛṣṇā bhavati,
S04n436:53: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhūt-kasmin sati vedanā bhavati,
S04n436:57: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat-kasmin sati sparśo bhavati,
S04n436:61: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat-kasmin sati ṣaḍāyatanaṃ bhavati,
S04n436:65: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat-kasmin sati nāmarūpaṃ bhavati,
S04n436:69: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat-kasmin sati vijñānaṃ bhavanti,
S04n436:73: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat-kasmin sati saṃskārā bhavanti,
S04n436:88: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
S04n436:90: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya pūrvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikārādbahulīkārājjñānamudapādi,
S04n436:105: atha bodhisattvasya punarapyetadabhavat-kasminnasati vistareṇa yāvatsaṃskārā na bhavanti,
S04n436:110: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavatīti ||
S04n436:111: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya pūrvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikārādbahulīkārājjñānamudapādi,
S04n436:117: so'haṃ bhikṣavastasmin samaye idaṃ duḥkhamiti yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:124: amī saṃskārā ayaṃ saṃskārasamudayo'yaṃ saṃskāranirodha iyaṃ saṃskāranirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:125: idaṃ vijñānamayaṃ vijñānasamudayo'yaṃ vijñānanirodha iyaṃ vijñānanirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:126: idaṃ nāmarūpamayaṃ nāmarūpasamudayo'yaṃ nāmarūpanirodhaḥ iyaṃ nāmarūpanirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:127: idaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanasamudayo'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ iyaṃ ṣaḍāyatananirodhagāminīṃ pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:128: ayaṃ sparśo'yaṃ spaśasamudayo'yaṃ sparśanirodhaḥ iyaṃ sparśanirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:129: iyaṃ vedanā ayaṃ vedanāsamudayo'yaṃ vedanānirodha iyaṃ vedanānirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:130: iyaṃ tṛṣṇā ayaṃ tṛṣṇāsamudayo'yaṃ tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ iyaṃ tṛṣṇānirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:132: ayaṃ bhavo'yaṃ bhavasamudayo'yaṃ bhavanirodhaḥ iyaṃ bhavanirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:133: iyaṃ jātirayaṃ jātisamudayo'yaṃ jātinirodhaḥ iyaṃ jātinirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:134: iyaṃ jarā ayaṃ jarāsamudayo'yaṃ jarānirodhaḥ iyaṃ jarānirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:135: idaṃ maraṇamayaṃ maraṇasamudayo'yaṃ maraṇanirodhaḥ iyaṃ maraṇanirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:137: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati yāvannirodho bhavatīti yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam |
S04n436:138: idaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo'yaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam ||
S04n436:139: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvena rātryāṃ paścime yāme'ruṇoddhāṭanakālasamaye nandīmukhyāṃ rātryau yatkiṃcitpuruṣeṇa satpuruṣeṇātipuruṣeṇa mahāpuruṣeṇa puruṣarṣabheṇa puruṣanāgena puruṣasiṃhena puruṣapuṃgavena puruṣaśūreṇa puruṣadhīreṇa puruṣajānena puruṣapadmena puruṣapuṇḍarīkeṇa puruṣadhaureyeṇānuttareṇa puruṣadamyasārathinā evaṃbhūtenāryeṇa jñānena jñātavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ sākṣātkartavyam,
S04n436:140: sarvaṃ tadekacittekṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya traividyādhigatā ||
S04n436:141: tato bhikṣavo devā āhuḥ-avakirata mārṣāḥ puṣpāṇi |
S04n436:143: ye tatra devaputrāḥ pūrvabuddhadarśinastasmin saṃnipatitā āsaṃste'vocan-mā sma tāvanmārṣāḥ puṣpāṇyavakirata yāvattāvadbhagavānnimittaṃ prāduḥkaroti |
S04n436:146: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatastān devaputrān vimatiprāptāñjñātvā saptatālamātraṃ vihāyasamabhyudgamya tatrastha idamudānamudānayati sma—
S04n436:147: chinnavartmopaśāntarajāḥ śuṣkā āsravā na punaḥ sravanti |
S04n436:148: chinne vartmani vartata duḥkhasyaiṣo'nta ucyate ||1 || iti ||
S04n436:171: utpanno vaidyarājaḥ pramocakaḥ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ pratiṣṭhāpako nirvāṇasukhe,
S04n436:176: prathame saptāhe bhikṣavastathāgatastasminneva bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo'sthāt-iha mayā'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n436:178: samanantaraprāpte khalu punarbhikṣavo bodhisattvena sarvajñatve atha tatkṣaṇameva daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvāstatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ parasukhasamarpitā abhuvan |
S04n436:180: yā'pi tā lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭā andhakārā iti pūrvavat |
S04n436:181: ṣaḍvikāraṃ ca daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātavo'kampat prākampat saṃprākampat |
S04n436:190: tebhyaśca ratnachatrebhyaḥ evaṃrūpā raśmijālā niścaranti sma,
S04n436:192: daśasu dikṣu bodhisattvāśca devāputrāścanandaśabdaṃ niścārayāmāsuḥ-utpannaḥ sattvapaṇḍitaḥ |
S04n436:195: dharmavarṣavinaye janabhaiṣajāṅkuraprarohaṇaṃ sarvakuśalamūlabījānāṃ vivardhanaṃ śraddhāṅkurāṇāṃ dātā vimuktiphalānām ||
S04n436:197: māraṃ vijitya sabalaṃ sa hi puruṣasiṃho
S04n436:202: caraṇau nipatya iti bhāṣiṣu māsi klānto |
S04n436:213: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ kāmāvacarā apsaraso bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ prāptābhijñaṃ paripūrṇasaṃkalpaṃ vijitasaṃgrāmaṃ nirjitamārapratyarthikamucchritachatradhvajapatākaṃ śūraṃ jayodgataṃ puruṣaṃ mahāpuruṣaṃ vaidyottamaṃ mahāśalyahartāraṃ siṃhaṃ vigatabhayalomaharṣaṃ nāgaṃ sudāntacittanirmalaṃ trimalaviprahīnaṃ vaidyakaṃ traividyatāmanuprāptaṃ pāragaṃ caturoghottīrṇaṃ kṣatriyamekaratnachatradhāriṇaṃ trailokyabrāhmaṇaṃ bāhitapāpakarmāṇaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhinnavidyāṇḍakoṣaṃ śramaṇaṃ sarvasaṅgasamatikrāntaṃ śrotriyaṃ niḥsṛtakleśaṃ śūramaprapātitadhvajaṃ balīyāṃsaṃ daśabaladhāriṇaṃ ratnākaramiva sarvadharmaratnasaṃpūrṇaṃ viditvā bodhimaṇḍābhimukhāstathāgatamābhirgāthābhirabhyastāviṣuḥ—
S04n436:219: jihmikṛta śakra brahmā bodhivara eṣatā hi |
S04n436:223: parāṅmukhāṃ kṛtāsyā tena māra jita senā |
S04n436:234: nāstyuttarasya nāśo yā ca varabodhi labdhā ||10 ||
S04n436:240: kṣatrā ca sattvakāyā cittāni cetanā ca |
S04n436:245: dṛṣṭvā ca mārasainyaṃ na kṣubhyate mano'sya
S04n436:246: puna dṛṣṭgha devasaṃghāṃ na ca harṣate sumedhā ||13 ||
S04n436:249: calito na cāsanā na ca kāyu vedhino'sya
S04n436:250: na ca snehu nāpi doṣastadanantare abhūvan ||14 ||
S04n436:251: lābhā sulabdha teṣāṃ maruṇāṃ narāṇa caiva
S04n436:252: ye tubhya dharma śrutvā pratipattimeṣyatī hi |
S04n436:254: sarve bhavema kṣipraṃ yatha tvaṃ manuṣyacandraḥ ||15 ||
S04n436:261: kṣipraṃ ca bodhi spṛśate vinihatya māraṃ
S04n436:265: vijane vane ca viharaṃ bhavi ko vitṛptaḥ
S04n436:266: kaḥ sattva arthakaraṇe na bhaveddhi tṛptaḥ ||18 ||
S04n436:275: abhisaṃbuddhasya bhikṣavastathāgatasya bodhivṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanopaviṣṭasya tasmin kṣaṇe'prameyāni buddhavikrīḍitānyabhūvan,
S04n436:287: sphuri jinavara kṣatrā trīṇi śāntā apāyāḥ |
S04n436:289: na ca khilamadadoṣā bādhiṣū kaṃci sattvam ||23 ||
S04n436:293: na ca jagadiha kaścitprekṣate śāstu mūrdham ||24 ||
